description: LaCie has teamed up with the renowned design agency Porsche Design GmbH to create this family of hard drives. Now you’ve got a stylish place to put all of your photos, music, videos and data. Setup is quick and easy. Within seconds, the LaCie Hard Drive is ready to start sharing and storing on either PC or Mac.User BenefitsSave your files, photos, MP3s and videosFast interface transfer rate: up to 480 MbpsSimple setup; easy-to-useLightweight, durable and stackable
title: LaCie 301103U 500GB Porsche 3.5 inch External Hard Drive
